[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” banner=”true” particles=”true” fullheight=”true” el_class=”mobile-center banner-curb”][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-lg-first” time=”0.65″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618756241625{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”]

Lightning Fast Decentralised Swap Exchange Protocol

tapswap is a revolutionary Cross Chain Swap Protocol with Layer 2 Scaling powered by Ethereum, Polkadot, Plasm & Acala Network. Use tapswap for Swapping, Market Creation, Provide Liquidity & Staking

  • Buy TAPS Token
  • 한국어

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column animate=”fadeInRight” css_animation=”none” offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ el_class=”order-first” time=”.9″][vc_column_text el_class=”header-image”]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”section section-pad section-bg-blend nopb” el_id=”intro”][vc_column width=”5/12″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”res-m-btm” time=”0″][vc_single_image image=”909″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” el_class=”order-md-first order-last” time=”0.5″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1608508493943{margin-bottom: 18px !important;}”]

Unique Swap protocol
with 2nd layer Swap aggregator on Binance Smart Chain

You can expect super fast and low cost network fees when using TapSwap Protocol.

  • Buy TAPS Token

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”section-pad no-pb section-bg-alt”][vc_column width=”5/12″ animate=”fadeInUp” css_animation=”none” el_class=”res-m-btm” time=”0″][vc_single_image image=”518″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″ time=”0.5″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]

What is tapswap?

tapswap is a decentralised protocol built primarily on the Ethereum Network.

Much like Uniswap, tapswap enables other developers to build on its API’s and dApp UI and source code which can assist in extending the reach of the protocol.

tapswap allows the creation of token markets, own TAPS token, Non-Custodial wallet connection, no need for KYC, features layer 2 scaling and you always control your funds for a completely decentralized experience[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section section-pad section-bg-btoa” el_id=”application”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″ time=”0″]

tapswap DApp APPS

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1606532134315{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”]Enter the tapswap Decentralised exchange simple UI ecosystem, here you can mange everything from your mobile, tablet or pc/laptop just by connecting to any ethereum wallet.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”res-m-btm” width=”1/2″ animate=”fadeInUp” time=”0″][vc_single_image image=”902″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”zoom” css_animation=”fadeInDown”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-1″ time=”0.5″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-block”]tapswap is designed in a similar style as other Swaps UI’s to facilitate the fastest adoption.

tapswap is developed on its own source code and has been written from beginning to end internally here at tapswap. It is an automated token exchange on Ethereum Network and features:

  • Non-Custodial Wallet integration via Web3
  • Market Creation abilities to all end users
  • Anyone can add Liquidation and share in fees
  • Staking rewards for holders of TAPS token
  • No more expensive fees
  • Try the DApp NOW

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-alt” el_id=”tokensale”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1520830144361{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2″ time=”0″]

TAPS Token Sale tapswap

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1606287702846{margin-top: 50px !important;}” el_class=”text-center”]TAPS token will be released as a special ERC-20 Token with mint, vote and staking capabilities. It’s compatibility of the token with third-party services wallets, exchanges etc, and provides easy-to-use integration.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner el_class=”event-info” animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-6″ time=”0″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6″ time=”0.5″]

ALL NEWS
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”faqs” el_class=”section-pad no-pb section-bg-alt”][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″ time=”0″]

Frequently asked questions FAQS

[vc_column_text css_animation=”bounceInLeft” el_class=”text-center” css=”.vc_custom_1606304159432{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”]Below we’ve provided a bunch of frequently asked questions relating to tapswap Protocol and TAPS Token Sale.  If you have any other questions, please get in touch using the contact form below.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-bg-alt”][vc_column animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″ time=”0.5″][vc_tta_tabs active_section=”1″ el_class=”ot-tabs”][vc_tta_section title=”General” tab_id=”1520927186706-24e6240e-867e”]
What is tapswap?

Unlike other clones that are built on Uniswap, tapswap is built from self developed source code and offers a superior swapping, liquidity and staking experience.

What Cryptocurrency can I use to purchase tokens?

You can use BNB, USDT ,BTC ETH and ADA or any cryptocurrency as long as it is BEP20 token on Binance Smartchain.

How can I participate in the Tap Token sale?

Because we are decentralised, we do not expect customers to complete KYC's, therefore anyone can participate in our token sale through the "buy now" links on this page. Please note that the official and only place to purchase TAPS is on this site and sub-domain buy.tapswap.org

Is there any benefits of holding TAPS Token?

TAPS token holders will receive 12% APY and a share of liquidity provider rewards, stake our coin for staking these staking benefits.

[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Crowd Sale” tab_id=”1520937009638-39a59121-c4f6″]
When does the crowd sale begin?

Initial token sale is only available from this website and all buyers will be able to view their purchases through the buy.tapswap.org dashboard. The sale begins on the 21/12/2020.

When will I receive my TAPS Tokens after purchasing?

TAPS Tokens will be distributed to your nominated Ethereum wallet (ERC-20 compatible wallets) immediately on completion of the Token Sales (22/05/2021)

When will TAPS list on exchanges?

TAPS Token will be listed on tapswap first and then we will look at some centralised exchanges in the second quarter of 2021.

How many tokens do the tapswap Team receive?

All tokens will be used for future development, staking rewards and general protocol upgrades, server costs and marketing. Only the founders will receive a small amount - for the actual amount, please visit the distribution chart above

[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Tokens” tab_id=”1520927144944-4e219566-c71a”]
How many tokens will be minted in total?

We will mint 250,000,000 TAPS Tokens. 150,000,000 will be available in the token sale. 100,000,000 Tokens will remain for staking rewards, development and other distribution as per the distribution charts above.

What dates will the Token sale run?

The TAPS token sale will start on the 21/12/2020 and run until the 20/05/2021.

How will TAPS Token be used with tapswap Dapp?

TAPS Token will feature front stage and purpose staking rewards, governance, liquidity and main swapping pair on the tapswap Protocol.

What is the total supply of TAPS Tokens?

250M / 250,000,000 TAPS Tokens have been minted please refer to: https://etherscan.io/token/0x286c0936c7eaf6651099ab5dab9ee5a6cb5d229d

What will happen with unsold tokens from the Sale Stages?

We are still determining whether we should use unsold TAPS for liquidity on our platform or whether they should be locked for a period or burned. The final decision will be made by the TAPS Token holder community & founder representatives.

What is the vesting term for the Project Team?

The Project Teams (5%) Vesting schedule: 50% will be locked for a period of 6 months from TGE. 50% will be locked for a period of 12 months from TGE.

[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Client” tab_id=”1520927153053-165c0f84-efe6″]
Where do I join the TAPS token sale?

Visit buy.tapswap.org and sign up to the dashboard and to buy.

Is there any regional restrictions on participation?

tapswap is a completely decentralised protocol, therefore anyone can buy tokens for use on our platform from any country.

Do I need to complete a KYC application to buy TAPS Tokens?

No, we aren't using KYC in our token sale.

Where can I store my TAPS Tokens once I get them?

You can use any Ethereum token compatible wallet, we always recommend using your own standalone wallet as then you own your own keys.

[/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”DETAILS” tab_id=”1520927169441-fbd46c2d-7973″]
Is there a softcap for the token sale?

We haven't set a softcap as the development is entirely funded by the founders and team already.

When will the tapswap Protocol V1 launch?

You will be able to use tapswap V1 by Christmas 2020 (25/12/2020)

Will there be a bug bounty?

We will be launching a bug bounty in the coming days and will publish the details in a news article on this site and on Medium

Will you be air dropping tokens like Uniswap?

This is a good question and something we have been questioned a lot about. We are open to considering rewarding first adopters who use our swap protocol potentially via an airdrop in the not too distant future.

[/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”section-pad section-bg-alt” el_id=”contact”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner animate=”fadeInUp” time=”0″]

Contact the tapswap Team CONTACT

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center” css=”.vc_custom_1606532673738{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”]Got a question? Reach out to us and we’ll get back to you shortly.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner animate=”fadeInUp” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″ time=”0.5″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1616141378342{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”]

  • twitter:@tapswapdex
  • emailadmin@tapswap.org
  • telegram:@tapswapdex

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
